alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Caldwell; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Caldwell, Guadalupe, north central Wilson and east central Bexar Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingsbury to near St. Hedwig. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seguin, Cibolo, Luling, McQueeney, St. Hedwig, La Vernia, Kingsbury, New Berlin, Staples, Zuehl, Geronimo, Fentress, Brownsboro, Nolte, Zipp, Stairtown, Adkins and Sayers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
